text: Va Dovudu Sulajmonro jod kun ej Rasul, on goh ki dar ʙorai kistzore dovari kardand, ki gusfandoni qavme saʙona ʙa kistzori digare daromada dar on co carida kistzorasro talaf dodand. Va Mo sohidi dovarii onho ʙudem. Pas Dovud hukm kard: gusfandone, ki kistzorro talaf dodaand, ʙa sohiʙi zamin doda savad. Ammo Sulajmon hukmi durust kard, ki sohiʙoni gusfandon, gusfandonro ʙa sohiʙi kistzor medihad va az nasli on va pasmi on va az siri on istifoda meʙarad, to ʙaroʙar sudani qimati kist, ʙa'd az on sohiʙoni gusfandon gusfandonro megirand
